citations.narrative:
At the gate behind the bear enclosures, the gap under the gate was greater than 8 inches. The size of this gap would not
prevent animals such as cats or other small animals from going under the fence. The fence must be constructed so that it
protects the animals in the facility by restricting animals and unauthorized persons from going through it or under it and
having contact with the animals in the facility, and so that it can can function as a secondary containment system for the
animals in the facility.
Correct by 15 June, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the manager.

narrative:
3.127(d) 
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
At the gate behind the bear enclosures, the gap under the gate was greater than 8 inches.  The size of this gap would not 
prevent animals such as cats or other small animals from going under the fence.  The fence must be constructed so that it 
protects the animals in the facility by restricting animals and unauthorized persons from going through it or under it and 
having contact with the animals in the facility, and so that it can can function as a secondary containment system for the 
animals in the facility. 
 
Correct by 15 June, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the manager. 
 
 n

species.common: GRAY WOLF / GREY WOLF / TIMBER WOLF
